title: Assistive Technology Professional (ATP)
description: APTs are professionals who can analyze the needs of consumers with disabilities, assist in the selection of appropriate assistive technology for the consumerâ€™s needs, and provid3 training in the use of the selected device(s), certified by the Rehabilitation Engineering and Assistive Technology Society of North America (RESNA).

title: Certified Driving Rehabilitation Specialists (CDRS)
description: CDRS work with people of all ages and abilities, exploring alternative transportation solutions for drivers with special needs, including helping older drivers and their families master the challenges of diminishing driving skills. They are certified by The Associattion for Driver Rehabilitation Specialists (ADED).
